Rediscover the awesome capabilities of the GALAXY Note II and see how it helps four professionals in their everyday life. Samsung Mobile Find out how the GALAXY Note II is the ultimate device as four strangers' lives intertwine, and they discover they've got more in common than just their regular café.
 
Camilla uses her GALAXY Note II to stay on top of her appointments and meetings, as well as reading novels on the Readers hub. When Camilla has a spare moment in her busy schedule, she uses the handset to stay in touch with friends and family.
 
The Note II is central to the life of Adam, manager of a local hotel, keeping him up to date on his schedule, staff timetable and providing access to his emails wherever he is. He is able to make notes at work and keep a record of his ideas and their progress.
 
As a student, John is constantly using his GALAXY Note II to record lecture notes, mind map ideas and keep up with university emails. And of course, update his social media networks from anywhere, any time.
 
Diane struggles to find interest in her finance job, turning to art as an escape. She uses her Note II to browse the web to research images and information on her subject matters. She makes sketches on the go using the S Pen and is able to upload them to her art blog instantly.
